brewery.name: Scuttlebutt Brewing Company
brewery.description: Scuttlebutt beers are brewed with the Northwest’s finest ingredients - barley from Vancouver (WA), hops from Yakima and Mabton (WA), a proprietary yeast from Odell, (OR) and some of the nation’s finest drinking water from the Spada Reservoir in the Cascade Mountains. We look forward to many years of brewing consistent, high quality beers as well as discovering new fun beers that will please your taste buds as well as ours.
